author: stoddard
msg: Win32: Log an error when create_thread fails.

author: stoddard
msg: Ignore AcceptMutex directive if it is present in an Apache on Windows config

author: stoddard
msg: Win32: Emulate the blocking send/recv calls that were called in these functions
when the timeout was set to 0. This is a bit of a hack but it is an improvement
over the original code. A better fix would involve making too many other changes
to the server that I would prefer not to make in the 1.3 tree.

author: wrowe
msg: Enough bug collection - the report of removing an important HKLM registry
key is enough for me to pull our recommendation of this package.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Fix segfault if content_type is NULL.
